name: UITextInputAssistantItem
desc: An object that manages bar button items that display in the shortcuts bar above the keyboard on iPad.

items.name: var leadingBarButtonGroups: [UIBarButtonItemGroup]
items.desc: The array of button item groups to display before the typing suggestions.

items.name: var trailingBarButtonGroups: [UIBarButtonItemGroup]
items.desc: The array of button item groups to display after the typing suggestions.

items.name: var allowsHidingShortcuts: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user can hide the shortcuts bar.
